chore: prevent "not enough memory" error in CI tests (#2356)

Run on few threads may call error
Solution: run in one thread (--maxWorkers=1 or -w 1)
https://discuss.circleci.com/t/not-enough-memory-while-testing-a-node-js-appplication/12768/17
